import { BrowserRouter, Routes, Route } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import Sidebar from "./components/layout/Sidebar"; import Topbar from "./components/layout/Topbar"; import Dashboard from "./pages/Dashboard"; import Settings from "./pages/Settings"; import UserManagement from "./pages/UserManagement"; import "./App.css"; export default function App() { const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(true); const handleSearch = (searchTerm) => { console.log("Searching for:", searchTerm); }; return ( {/* APP ROOT */}
{/* SIDEBAR */} {/* MAIN AREA */}
{/* TOPBAR */} setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen)} onSearch={handleSearch} /> {/* PAGE CONTENT */}
} /> } /> } />
); }
